snippet: A man, 18, who was being chased by the police, was killed in his family’s home in the Bronx.
abstract: Teenager Ramarley Graham is shot and killed by a New York City Police officer after running into his Bronx home as officers pursued him; department spokesman says there is no evidence that Graham was armed; name of the officer is not released.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and AL BAKER

lead_paragraph: A man, 18, who was being chased by the police, was killed in his family’s home in the Bronx.

headline.seo: Bronx 18-Year-Old Fatally Shot By an Officer After a Chase
headline.main: Officer Fatally Shoots Teenager in Bronx
headline.print_headline: 18-Year-Old Is Fatally Shot By an Officer After a Chase
